comment._content:
A Bain/LOC group photo, posted to Flickr on November 26, 2010, includes Gunboat Smith:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/5208799251/]

In a fight on January 1, 1914, Gunboat Smith knocked out Canadian Arthur Pelkey. Manager Jim Buckley stands right behind Smith:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4668752209/]
